header.name: chaos/preprocessor/facilities/intercept.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that intercepts the concatenation of a numeric value.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to an entity that expands to nothing when a number is concatenated to it.
macro.para: This macro is used to intercept concatenations of numbers ranging from 0 to . When a number in this range is concatenated to the result of this macro produces a new macro that expands to nothing.
This macro is primarily useful in situations where the library automatically concatenates numbers to user-specified arguments.
